$MyPCName$, could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and find out the cause?
You might find out the cause if you meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font>.
$MyPCName$, could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and find out the cause? You might find out the cause if you meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font>.
(Say that the reason the refugees couldn't hunt was because of the beasts trained by Kharon.)
Those Kharon... kidnapping wasn't enough and they went this far... it looks like they're planning to gather the residents into a single place and kidnap them all at once.
I won't let that happen. Good work again, $MyPCName$.
The activities of the members of the Maple Alliance are well known amongst the Humanitas regular army here in Kidel. $MyPCName$, you played a big role in that.
Humanitas has formed the special forces to enhance the capabilities of our soldiers. Our objective is to train exceptional agents like you. This force will be composed of the most elite of Humanitas.
The mission of the special forces is very dangerous and complicated. Ah! $MyPCName$, would you like to volunteer for this mission as well?
I believe you can become an example to the special forces if you take on this mission together. Many soldiers will be encouraged by it.
(Say that you will volunteer.)
Great! I'll transmit the mission to you via the Humanitas operation HUD. $MyPCName$, this won't be easy even for you. Don't let your guard down and complete the mission.
I'll transmit the mission to you via the Humanitas operation HUD. $MyPCName$, this won't be easy even for you. Don't let your guard down and complete the mission.
You completed the mission perfectly. It would be great if our soldiers could be like you.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
(Say that it feels like there has been a decrease in intel coming from the squad.)
You're very sharp. The squad suffered greatly from the beasts released by the Daemon Army. You've seen them in Kidel, right? Those hideous things with horns...
The loss was especially great in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>. I believe they were specially trained.
<font color="#909090">(<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004393[gender:0]$</font> is in that squad... you can't stand by and do nothing.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> to suppress the beasts of the Daemon Army.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. Let's show them that they can't push Humanitas around.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> to suppress the beasts of the Daemon Army.
I have dreamed of this moment.
(Say that you suppressed the beasts of the Daemon Army that attacked the squad.)
I didn't tell you because you might be worried, but <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004393[gender:0]$</font> was receiving treatment for getting bitten by the beast.
I'm sure <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004393[gender:0]$</font> will also be happy. Good work, $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$, there have been signs of a schism in the Leshy. According to the squad, a group of Leshies indulging in violence formed.

I'm worried that <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> the peackeeper is losing leadership. I think you should meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> and understand the situation.
$MyPCName$, please head for <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately.
I think you should meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> and understand the situation. $MyPCName$, please head for <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately.
You're back, $MyPCName$. Did you find out the inside story with the schism in the Leshy?
(You told <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> what you talked about with <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font>.)
On the surface, they shout for the expulsion of strangers. But they are actually hoodlums committing all sorts of wrong deeds...
As long as the Daemon Army doesn't give up on trying to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy, more of such groups will continue to appear.
I will be needing your help in the future. Good work, $MyPCName$.
We are recruiting for the Humanitas special forces, but not many signed up this time.
Everyone want to sign up in the beginning but... the signup rate has been dropping since they take on very dangerous missions.
I think it's time to create another legend for the special forces mission. You know what I mean, right?
Take a nap?
If you set a new record for the mission completion rate, everyone will want to sign up for the special forces. $MyPCName$, you're the object of envy in the Humanitas regular army.
<font color="#909090">(Feels like you got hooked...)</font>
Alright! I will transmit the mission via the Humanitas operation HUD. Please set a new record!
Alright! I will transmit the mission via the Humanitas operation HUD. Please set a new record!
Perfect... this mission completion rate will gather a cloud of people wanting to sign up for the special forces.
You didn't let me down again this time. Good work, $MyPCName$.
A ghost, no way...
What is it?
It's a one-horned winged monster that hides in the dark and attacks our allies.
The allied soldiers attacking <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> are afraid after getting attacked by it.
It looks fearsome... I understand why they're afraid as it disappears completely after attacking stealthily but...
But rumors of it being a ghost among the soldiers are demoralizing them.
(Say that you want to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> to see it.)
You're not going to see only, right? $MyPCName$, please suppress the one-horned winged monster of the Daemon Army.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> to suppress the one-horned winged monster of the Daemon Army.
(Say that you suppressed the one-horned winged monster of the Daemon Army.)
You sure are amazing, $MyPCName$. I need to hurry and send this fact over the Humanitas regular army network.
No more ghost rumors will be going around thanks to you. Good work again, $MyPCName$.
We received intel that the number of surveillance drones in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> decreased noticeably.
I'm talking about the drones in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> to detect attacks from Kharon.
I know all about it!
It will be hard to defend <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> with the decrease in drones... I'm worried why the number in operation was reduced.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find out.)
Would you do that, $MyPCName$? After you grasp the situation, let me know if you need help.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find out.)
You're back, $MyPCName$. Did you figure out why the number of drones decreased?
(You talked about what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
Using the parts from <font color="#ffd200">Sect</font> was a great idea! Who would be able to think of this but you?
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>?
What is it?
It's not that something happened but... I'm concerned of the refugees living in a dangerous and barren land.
<font color="#909090">(Looks like <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> is very concerned of the refugees...)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to resolve any difficulties there.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. I look forward to your great results again.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to resolve any difficulties there.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$. What help did you give the refugees this time?
(You talked about what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
Removing <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001354$</font> from the magic wand of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022204$</font>... That's a great idea!
You'll probably be called the 'savior of the refugees' by now. Good work again, $MyPCName$.
(Say that she looks worried.)
We received intel that Kharon activity increased noticeably near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
That's where the refugees hunt the most... For their livelihood, they even risk the danger of getting kidnapped.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to understand the situation.)
Could you do that? Thank you, $MyPCName$.
Since the situation could be critical, please move out immediately.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to understand the situation.)
You're finally back, $MyPCName$.
(Say that Kharon's kidnapping season returned and many refugees have been kidnapped.)
It can't be! Is <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> fine?
(Say that you defeated the Kharon forces that kidnapped the refugees and there won't be any victims for a while.)
That's a relief. Let's work hard to prevent this from happening again, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you'll work together.)
Those monsters... I won't let them be!
What is it?
I heard from <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004393[gender:0]$</font>, who came back from scouting, about Kharon harassing the refugees for fun.
<font color="#909090">(Those jerks... something has to be done.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to teach them a lesson.)
I leave it to you, $MyPCName$. Since this is urgent, please depart immediately.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font>!
(Say that <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022306$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> were throwing knives at the refugees for fun.)
Those animals! You didn't let them be, did you?
(Say that you suppressed all of them.)
...When will this world go back to being normal?
(Say that you'll help until then.)
You're reliable, $MyPCName$. I will do my best as well.
There's something that's always troubling my mind. It's like a small fish bone caught in your throat.
(Ask what it's about.)
It's about the Daemon Army trying to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy.
I would like to tighten the security of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>... but the Leshy will not allow Humanitas to station there...
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
I'm always receiving your help. Thank you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Did you find a way to tighten the security of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>?
(You told <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.)
Embedding <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001355$</font> on the cudgel of the Leshy...
Yes! The Daemon Army were cut by the sharp poison stinger they happened to encounter. It will definitely be a big help in increasing the combat power of the Leshy!
You completed the mission neatly again. Good work, $MyPCName$.
(Say that she looks disturbed.)
I haven't slept lately.
(Ask why she didn't sleep.)
$MyPCName$, you won't understand. You don't know the weight of responsibility shouldered by the leader of Humanitas...
(Ask if there's anything you can help.)
Then... could you get me <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001356$</font>? I heard it's good for sleeping when placed in the bedroom.
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022407$</font> is said to inhabit <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>.
(Say that you'll get it.)
Could you get me <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001356$</font>? I heard it's good for sleeping when placed in the bedroom.
Oh! Is this <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001356$</font>?!
And you brought this much... You must have made a lot of effort, $MyPCName$. But my skin is important.
(Ask whether she just said skin.)
Ah, no... I meant my skin will become better if I get to sleep.
(Question her whether <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001356$</font> has an effect for skin care.)
Hm... $MyPCName$, you have a lot of questions unlike yourself.
I want to rest. Please leave, $MyPCName$.
We received intel that lifeforms inhabiting near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> started to surround the nest.
The intelligence department predicts the Daemon Army encroached the lifeforms and are controlling them.
If that prediction is right, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> will be attacked by the lifeforms controlled by the Daemon Army if nothing is done about it.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. I trust you this time as well.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$.
(Say that the lifeforms encroached by the dark power tried to attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
The prediction of the intelligence department was right. It was a ploy by the Daemon Army to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy.
(Say that you completely suppressed them.)
Perfect as always. Good work, $MyPCName$.
We received intel that the atmosphere in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> became chaotic. Leshies doing business decreased... and there are even Leshies who don't leave their home.
There are no changes to the movements of the Daemon Army in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>... I'm sure something else is happening.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to understand the situation.)
Would you do that? Then I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to understand the situation.)
What was going on in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>?
(You told <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
Leshy hoodlums created with the excuse of driving out strangers... I feel uncomfortable because we are also responsible for their creation.
(Say that you suppressed them to prevent them hanging around near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
Thank you for the trouble, $MyPCName$. You always take care of things perfectly.
How did the Daemon Army make the mechanical soldiers of Tairen come under their command?
(Ask if she's talking about the mechanical soldiers that turned evil.)
Yes, those machines that turned dark and are controlled by the Daemon Army. The Humanitas Research Institute is making various efforts to investigate the cause.
$MyPCName$, the research could make progress if you could get the parts of the mechanical soldiers that turned evil.
(Ask which parts are needed.)
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001357$</font> of the mechanical soldiers deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>. It's a dark, square conductor made of metal.
(Say that you'll take care of it immediately.)
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> has tight security. Be careful, $MyPCName$.
It's <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001357$</font> deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>. It's a dark, square conductor made of metal.
(Say that you retrieved <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001357$</font> that turned evil.)
The battle must have been fierce, but you brought it without any damage. Your skills are amazing, $MyPCName$.
Well done.
The attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> failed again. It's because of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022601$</font> of the Daemon Army.
They watch our allied soldiers from the air and then attack at lightning speed. That speed is physically impossible.
The views of the research team is that damage to our allies can be reduced if the principle of that extreme speed can be studied.

$MyPCName$, could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001358$</font>? If the research team could analyze it, they might be able to reduce the damage to our allies.
Leave it to me.
Then I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001358$</font>?
(Say that you brought <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001358$</font>.)
I'll send it to the research team immediately to ask them to research it. Once the research succeeds, the damage to our allies will be reduced significantly.
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
You don't look well. Are you feeling all right?
The Humanitas military hospital is overflowing with patients. The patients are lying down outside the hospital as there aren't enough rooms.
(Ask whether many soldiers got injured in the operation.)
No, all of them were bitten by robot spiders in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.
They inhabit <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and bite any lifeform that moves.
Your entire body becomes paralyzed once bitten by the robot spiders. We have no choice but to dispatch even more soldiers to evacuate the paralyzed soldiers.
<font color="#909090">(The situation is serious... the mounting damage has to be stopped.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and suppress the robot spiders.)
Would you do that? Thank you very much, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and suppress the robot spiders.)
(Say that you suppressed the robot spiders in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.)
You succeeded! Our soldiers won't get paralyzed by them for a while.
Peace will now return to the Humanitas military hospital. Good work, $MyPCName$.
Sigh... another failure...
What is it?
The attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> failed again. It's because of that winged one-horned monster of the Daemon Army.
They watch the soldiers from the air, attack at lightning speed, and disappear without a trace. The soldiers fall into chaos, scattering their battle formation.
<font color="#909090">(This stimulates your competitive spirit... you want to contend against it.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> immediately and face the winged one-horned monster.)
Hm, today... you seem very willing. Then please depart, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> immediately and face the winged one-horned monster.)
(Say that you suppressed the winged one-horned monster in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.)
That easily? Even the allied special forces took a huge blow... $MyPCName$, I don't know what your limit is.
Good work. I will deploy the allied troops to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> right away.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. I would like you to urgently go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020034$</font>.
(Ask what is going on.)

Aetherine production in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font> isn't going smoothly due to the prolonged war with Tairen. It's because the parts in the aetherine reactor are old and aren't performing as they should.

<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020034$</font> has aetherine generators set up by Tairen. If you could get the part called <font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font> from the generator, the aetherine reactor in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font> will be able to perform as it should.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020034$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font>.)
<font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font> is in the shape of a rhombus inside the aetherine generator. I'll leave this to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020034$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font>.)
(Say that you got <font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font>.)
Yes, these are the parts. Those Tairen... they replaced the parts recently. These are brand new.
I will send them to the tech team to replace the old parts. Good work, $MyPCName$.
Emergency situation. The intelligence department found Tairen's <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100115$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font>.
Tairen is planning to link <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020010$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font> with a highway.
Once the highway is constructed, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font> the ally supply route will be attacked by Tairen forces from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020010$</font>.
They will take the highway and go straight to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font>.
<font color="#909090">(That means the collapse of the Humanitas supply route. The construction of that highway cannot be completed.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100115$</font> and stop the highway construction from being completed by suppressing the forces sent there.)
This is why I trust you. Please depart immediately, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100115$</font> and stop the highway construction from being completed by suppressing the forces sent there.)
(Say that you stopped the highway construction by suppressing the forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100115$</font>.)
$MyPCName$, the precious supply route of Humanitas has been protected because of you. I would like to thank you on behalf of Humanitas.
The reconnaissance team discovered <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font>.
Analyzing the video footage revealed it to be a warehouse storing food. The food was obtained by forcing the kidnapped refugees into hard labor.
If you attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font> and neutralize the Kharon forces, the allied soldiers can seize the food.
A huge blow can be dealt to Kharon if we can do that. And this is a chance for our allies to stock up on rations.

As soon as you're done with preparations, go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font>, and neutralize <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023100[gender:0]$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023101[gender:0]$</font>.

As soon as you're done with preparations, go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font>, and neutralize <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023100[gender:0]$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023101[gender:0]$</font>.
(Say that you suppressed the Kharon forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font>.)
That was faster than expected. Did you really suppress all of the forces?
Yep.
Amazing, $MyPCName$. I will send the regular army immediately to transport the food to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font>.
Tairen placed an explosive in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font>.
<font color="#909090">(<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> is cherished by Captain <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004616[gender:1]$</font>...)</font>
I know, but <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> was built to preserve and study the flora and fauna of Kidel.
It's like an atonement for devastating Kidel with war. Tairen placed an explosive as if mocking that meaning.
They are thinking of blowing up all of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> seeing the scale of the explosive. The intelligence department thinks their intention is to demoralize Humanitas.
<font color="#909090">(You will never let them destroy <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font>.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> and disarm the explosive placed by Tairen.)
It will be a difficult task, but I believe you'll be able to do it, $MyPCName$. The <font color="#ffd200">MK42 explosive</font> is a very elaborate device.
Please be careful that the explosive doesn't go off.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> and disarm the explosive placed by Tairen.)
(Say that you disarmed all of the explosives placed in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font>.)
We protected the precious place that was built with everyone's strength! We will try harder to preserve the ecosystem of Kidel.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
Did you know Kharon planted a spy disguised as a refugee in Humanitas? The spy was selling stolen information to Tairen.

In return for the information, Tairen regularly provided Kharon with supplies. We obtained intel that Kharon has been releasing some of the <font color="#ffd200">supply box</font> to the Leshy hoodlums.
I think they're trying to win over the Leshy hoodlums and mobilize them in kidnapping refugees. The kidnapping of the refugees will be accelerated if the Leshy hoodlums are won over.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020008$</font> and seize the <font color="#ffd200">supply box</font> before it goes to the Leshy hoodlums.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020008$</font> and seize the <font color="#ffd200">supply box</font> before it goes to the Leshy hoodlums.
(Say that none of the <font color="#ffd200">supply boxes</font> went to the Leshy hoodlums and were seized.)
You did it, $MyPCName$. Thank you for doing a great job.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font> is a temple of ancient Kritias. No one know who built the temple and for what purpose since it was a long, long time ago.
This place was discovered by chance after moving to Kidel to fight back Tairen. The research team is investigating the relics from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font> emitting a blue light.
We haven't found the identity of the blue light or the function of the relic yet, but we won't give and will continue the research.
$MyPCName$, if you could go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font> and get the <font color="#ffd200">shiny blue relic</font>, the research could make big progress.
Leave it to me.
Thank you, $MyPCName$. Please get ones that aren't damaged for the research.
$MyPCName$, if you could go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font> and get the <font color="#ffd200">shiny blue relic</font>, the research could make big progress.
(Say that you got the <font color="#ffd200">shiny blue relic</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font>.)
This blue light... it's a completely different energy from aetherine! It will take time, but the research team will definitely find out the identity of this blue light.
Good work again, $MyPCName$.

The intelligence team found the secret residence of the Leshy hoodlums after much effort. The place called <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100117$</font> exists in a secret place in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020008$</font>.
The Leshy hoodlums made it their base, attacking strangers and expanding their forces. They cry for the overthrow of strangers, but they're just a violent gang that assaults and extorts.
We can deal them a huge blow if we attack their base.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100117$</font> and suppress the Leshy hoodlums.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100117$</font> and suppress the Leshy hoodlums.
(Say that you went to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100117$</font> and suppressed the Leshy hoodlums.)
You always take care of it neatly. It's going to take them a long time to recover their forces.
I won't forget your contribution to Kidel's peace.
Why the long face?
The Humanitas-Maple Alliance surprise attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> failed.
As you know, there's a huge barrier in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> built by Tairen. And beyond that barrier is Tairen...
Even before we got to attack the enemies defending <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>, we had to retreat after getting caught by the <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensor</font>.
Future surprise attacks won't be possible as long as the high performance <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensors</font> are all over <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>.
(Say that you will infiltrate <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> stealthily and turn off the <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensor</font>.)
If you could do that, then the Humanitas-Maple Alliance forces can make a surprise attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>.
It won't be easy, but I leave this to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will infiltrate <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> stealthily and turn off the <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensor</font>.)
(Say that you turned off all of the <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensors</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>.)
You pulled off something big, $MyPCName$. I will contact Captain <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004616[gender:1]$</font> immediately and set up a surprise attack.
$MyPCName$, your performance actually brought disaster to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> this time.
What are you talking about?
You blocked Kharon's attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> many times, and they became furious because of that.
We obtained intel that the angered Kharon forces are throwing grenades indiscriminately at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to defeat the Kharon forces.)
That will be good idea. I leave this to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to defeat the Kharon forces.)
I have dreamed of this moment.
(Say that you defeated all of the Kharon forces throwing grenades at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
Destroying without purpose... Kharon is very cruel... Don't wince and protect the refugees together, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will never give up on the refugees.)
As expected of $MyPCName$! I will do my best as well.
I suddenly thought... what kind of woman do men of Maple World like?
(Say that you aren't sure since it's different per person.)
(Ask why she is curious.)
I know, I wonder why I'm curious. No, no, I'm not curious at all... I just asked.
Now, let's start the briefing. You know that <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001359$</font> is on the tail of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font>, right?
Analyzing the ore will be helpful in figuring out its structure. If it succeeds, Humanitas will also be able to design a four-footed weapon.
Now, hurry to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001359$</font> from the tail of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font>.
Now, hurry to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001359$</font> from the tail of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font>.
This is <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001359$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font>!
It's my first time seeing one this close. It's dazzingly beautiful!
It gives off a different light from all angles... It will be very beautiful if made into a necklace.
(Ask whether she just said the ore will be made into a necklace.)
Huh? No... I'm just saying.
(Say that you will deliver the ore to the research team on your way back.)
I will not permit that. I'm going out for a walk and will do that myself.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
The Daemon Army forces stationed in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> have strengthened recently.
They haven't attacked the refugees yet, but we need to find out why their forces have strengthened.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find out why the Daemon Army strengthened its forces.)
That will be a good idea. Please depart immediately, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find out why the Daemon Army strengthened its forces.)
You're back, $MyPCName$. Why did the Daemon Army strengthen their forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>?
(Say that you had no choice but to suppress them because they came at you stubbornly.)
(Say that you're sure they're not trying to turn <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> evil.)
I see... we'll slowly give time and figure out the true nature of the facility. Good work, $MyPCName$.
Those devils!
What is it?
The squad witnessed refugees kidnapped by Kharon in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
They had no time to take action because the refugees were put in the vehicle and left.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find a way to rescue the refugees.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. Please give hope to the refugees.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find a way to rescue the refugees.)
(Say that you weren't able to rescue the kidnapped refugees, but you gave <font color="#ffd200">Kharon Beast's Meat</font> to the refugees that were short on food.)
Seems like the kidnapped refugees were hunters... It's sad, but thank you for resolving the food shortage for the refugees, $MyPCName$.
Since you don't give up and help the refugees, they won't lose hope. I thank you on behalf of everyone in Kritias, $MyPCName$.
There are rumors going around that <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> is struck with fear.
Some lifeform is roaming around the forest like mad and attacking the Leshy. Let me correct that. It's attacking anything that is alive and not just the Leshy.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to understand the situation.)
Then I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to understand the situation.)
I have been waiting, $MyPCName$. Did you find the subject that struck the forest with fear?
(Say that <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> that was encroached by the dark power went mad after its mind broke down.)
Daemon Army... I will never forgive them... None of them will leave Kritias.
Did you lay <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> to rest?
Yep.
It was perfect again, $MyPCName$.
I think our exchange with the Leshy became distant because we have been busy taking care of the refugees.
(Say that you talked to <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> not too long ago.)
That's exactly it. If we can talk a little more, we will reach a level where we can commune with the Leshy.
If our sincerity is accepted, we will be a step close to the true nature of that mysterious power.
<font color="#909090">(It feels like you got hooked, but you have no choice and have to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>...)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help the Leshy.)
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help the Leshy.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Did you help the Leshy?
(Say that you got the Leshy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022405$ Extract</font> to repair their temple.)
You didn't get covered in extract, did you?
(Say that you had a hard time because your body was covered with the sticky <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022405$ Extract</font>.)
Don't come near me... I mean... good work, $MyPCName$. Hurry back and wash... take a rest.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. I was thinking of calling you.
What is it?

We obtained intel that the ecosystem near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> is thrown into confusion. Something like a spore scattered everywhere, and the animals of the forest are going wild because of it.
Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and investigate?
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
I knew you would say that. Then depart now.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
You're back, $MyPCName$. What was the cause of the confusion in the ecosystem?
(Say that the pollen of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font> made the animals to hallucinate.)
Pollen of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font>?! But it's really good for the skin... Then what happened?
(Say that you reduced the number of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font>.)
(Say that you won't see pollen of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font> for a while.)
...I see. Good work.
(Say that she looks sad.)
You have a lot of questions today. Please leave, $MyPCName$.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. This is an emergency situation. <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022505$</font> broke into <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and it's a mess.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> is in chaos because they push around and attack the Leshy.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help the Leshy.)
We have no time to waste. Since this is an emergency, please depart immediately.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help the Leshy.)
(Say that you destroyed <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022505$</font> pushing around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
Why did <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022505$</font> push around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>?
(Say that the Leshy hoodlums captured <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022505$</font> and released them in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> to steal.)
I can't believe it... <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> almost fell into great chaos. Thank you for taking quick action.
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
Out of the frying pan into the fire. Who knew this would happen?
What is it?
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022602$</font> encroached by the dark power in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> is releasing pollen.
(Ask wasn't <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022602$</font> scattering pollen a hunting practice.)
The problem is that <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022602$</font> was encroached by the dark power. The contaminated pollen is corrupting northern Kidel with the dark power.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> immediately and defeat <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022602$</font> encroached by the dark power.)
I leave it to you, $MyPCName$. Please stop it before the dark power spreads any further.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> immediately and defeat <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022602$</font> encroached by the dark power.)
(Say that you defeated <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022602$</font> that was encroached by the dark power.)
Your performance stopped the dark power from corrupting northern Kidel. Thank you, $MyPCName$.
The Humanitas Research Institute is doing research on the Daemon Army's evilization. As you know, the mechanical soldiers that turned evil become black and go under the control of the Daemon Army.
There are no huge accomplishments yet but... the research will make progress if you can get the parts from the mechanical soldiers that turned evil.
(Say that you will get the necessary parts.)
It's <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001362$</font> deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> has tight security. Please return safely.
Please get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001362$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020010$</font>.
(Say that you brought <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001362$</font>.)
A few are damaged, but most are fine.
(Say that it was inevitable as the battle was too fierce.)
The research institute will be very grateful. It's thanks to you that we were able to get this many <font color="#ffd200">B27 logic circuit</font> intact.
Your skills are improving day by day. Good work, $MyPCName$.
I suddenly thought... what kind of gift do men of Maple World like?
<font color="#909090">(You are curious of her intention, but it doesn't look like she will tell you why.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This is a bit mischievous, but maybe I should play a trick.)</font>
(Say that the men of Maple World like very hideous and fierce pets.)
The men of Maple World are strange... I guess there must be a reason.
Now I'm getting curious. The most hideous and fierce animal here would be... uh... could you capture one <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022706$</font>?
(Ask whether <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022706$</font> is the most ferocious beast of the Daemon Army deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.)
Yes, that's correct. Didn't you say the men of Maple World like hideous and fierce beasts?
<font color="#909090">(You can't refute it...)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and capture <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022706$</font>.)
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and capture <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022706$</font>.)
(Say that <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022706$</font> was too wild and you failed to capture it.)
(Say that you couldn't bring a single one since they all charged at you with the intent of dying.)
I already knew. There's no way that the fierce <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022706$</font> could be captured.
I sent you because you tricked me. Don't do that again, $MyPCName$.
(Say that she looks sad.)
I'm a bit tired. Please leave, $MyPCName$.
Impossible... even the special forces suffered greatly...
What is it?
The regular army that was deployed not too long ago to attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> suffered greatly from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022701$</font>.
They had no choice but to retreat because many were injured by its monstrous strength and sharp horns.
Thus, the most elite troops of Humanitas were deployed, but the result was the same. They suffered greatly and had no choice but to retreat.
<font color="#909090">(Somehow this makes your blood boil... you want to defeat it.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">Turkalion</font> and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022701$</font>.)
It's a dangerous mission, but I believe you can do it, $MyPCName$. If you succeed, it will mean a lot when our allies conquer <font color="#ffd200">Turkalion</font>.
Then I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">Turkalion</font> and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022701$</font>.)
(Say that you suppressed <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022701$</font> deployed to <font color="#ffd200">Turkalion</font>.)
The special forces couldn't do it, but you defeated it alone!
I knew you could do it but... I wonder what your limit is... it's amazing.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
How can this be? An entire platoon...
What is it?
A platoon of the Humanitas regular army was captured by Tairen forces.
(Ask how that happened.)
It's because Tairen wiretapped the contents of the operation from the communication between <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font>.
The intelligence department traced it back to a <font color="#ffd200">radio tower</font> that Tairen built in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020016$</font> for wiretapping.
As long as the wiretapping continues, there's no guarantee that we won't suffer these losses again.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020016$</font> and destroy the <font color="#ffd200">radio tower</font>.)
Then I leave it to you, $MyPCName$. You need to act without a moment's delay.
Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020016$</font> and destroy the <font color="#ffd200">radio tower</font>.
(Say that you destroyed Tairen's <font color="#ffd200">radio tower</font>.)
It breaks my heart that a platoon got captured but... this won't happen again due to your performance.
Thank you, $MyPCName$.
You know that Kharon has spies in Humanitas, right? It's hard to hunt them down since they infiltrated by disguising as refugees.
Kharon sold the information the spies stole to Tairen, and Tairen is compensating them.
We obtained intel that the <font color="#ffd200">gold bar box</font> to be delivered to Kharon is ready in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020010$</font>.
Kharon will arrive in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020010$</font> soon to claim the <font color="#ffd200">gold bar box</font> which is their compensation for the information.
Could you intercept the <font color="#ffd200">gold bar box</font> before Kharon claims it? It will be a painful loss to them.
Then I'll wait for the mission to be completed perfectly.
Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020010$</font> and intercept the <font color="#ffd200">gold bar box</font> before Kharon claims it?
(Say that you intercepted the <font color="#ffd200">gold bar box</font> before Kharon could claim it.)
Those Tairen... will need to prepare another gold bar box. It's because Kharon doesn't act without compensation.
Thank you for your wonderful perfomance again, $MyPCName$.
(Say that she looks happy.)
I just thought of a method to make the Tairen Guardsmen fall into panic!
(Ask about the method.)

The Tairen Guardsmen are formed completely of nobles. Due to their life of luxury, they regularly use the <font color="#ffd200">luxury item box</font> even in the battleground to live an abundant life.
The <font color="#ffd200">luxury item box</font> transported by air from the kingdom contains the finest items used by nobles such as fancy clothes and accessories, cologne, and beverages.
We obtained intel that the <font color="#ffd200">luxury item box</font> transported by air from Tairen is going to arrive near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font> soon.

If the items in the <font color="#ffd200">luxury item box</font> are seized, the Tairen Guardsmen will fall into panic. It's because they never experienced inconvenience in their life. Don't you think it will be fun?
If it piques your interest, please go near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font> and intercept the items in the <font color="#ffd200">luxury item box</font>.
If it piques your interest, please go near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font> and intercept the items in the <font color="#ffd200">luxury item box</font>.
(Say that you intercepted the items in the <font color="#ffd200">luxury item box</font> that was to be supplied to the Tairen Guardsmen.)
Those Guardsmen must be in a fidget. Some will even whine about going back to the kingdom.
(Ask how she knows so well.)
I was a noble of Tairen as well. To be precise, I was royalty.
I don't need things like the luxury item box anymore. What's important is that the citizens of Tairen gain true freedom...
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
We obtained intel that robots in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020051$</font> are making weapons from waste with the purpose of selling them to Kharon.
(Ask whether the robots in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020051$</font> are robots abandoned by Tairen.)

That's correct. The versions that failed in the development process were abandoned in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020051$</font>. They live together in the <font color="#ffd200">Dumping Ground</font>. I can't believe they were making weapons...

I think their intention is to expand their forces. According to the intelligence department, there is going to be a weapon trade today between Kharon and the robots in <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100118$</font> in the <font color="#ffd200">Dumping Ground</font>.

Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100118$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020051$</font> and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023300$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023301$</font>?
Once the robots are suppressed, I will deply the regular army to destroy the weapons.

Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100118$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020051$</font> and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023300$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023301$</font>?
(Say that you suppressed the abandoned robots in <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100118$</font>.)
Good work. We prevented the weapons from going to Kharon.
I will deploy the regular army to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100118$</font> to destroy the weapons.
Kharon is growing crops in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font>. They kidnapped refugees and forced them to do hard labor.
According to our squad, a new <font color="#ffd200">seed</font> arrived in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font> today.
If the <font color="#ffd200">seed</font> is seized, Kharon will have problems with their food supply since the farmland won't be worked on.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font> and seize the <font color="#ffd200">seed</font>.)
I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font> and seize the <font color="#ffd200">seed</font>.)
(Say that you went to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font> and seized the <font color="#ffd200">seed</font>.)
I feel great just imagining Kharon starving.
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
Did you know the research team is investigating the principle of evilization? It's the power that the Daemon Army uses to make the mechanical soldiers of Tairen their subordinates.

Our squad discovered an equipment in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020035$</font> they suspects of being an evilization converter. We think that equipment is used to convert the mechanical soldiers to subordinates of the Daemon Army.

If we can get the <font color="#ffd200">key part of the converter</font>, it will be helpful in investigating the principle of evilization. Your mission is to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020035$</font> and get the <font color="#ffd200">key part of the converter</font>.
Please take good care that the part doesn't get damaged.
Your mission is to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020035$</font> and get the <font color="#ffd200">key part of the converter</font>.
(Say that you got the <font color="#ffd200">key part of the converter</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020035$</font>.)
These are... parts used to repair mechanical soldiers. The device we thought to be an evilization converter was just a common repair device.
We failed this time, but Humanitas will get down to the principle of evilization. It's unfortunate but thank you for the trouble, $MyPCName$.

Kharon set up a <font color="#ffd200">high-frequency aetherine emanator</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020009$</font>. The excessive supply of aetherine makes the Tairen robots aggressive and go out of control.
I think they're trying to make the abandoned robots in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020009$</font> go out of control.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020009$</font> is where the squad is carrying out an operation... I think they're trying to inflict loss on our allies.
Actually, the allied squad carrying out an operation in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020009$</font> some time ago suffered greatly from attacks by the robots that went out of control.
The losses will continue unless the <font color="#ffd200">high-frequency aetherine emanator</font> is turned off.
$MyPCName$, please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020009$</font> and turn off the <font color="#ffd200">high-frequency aetherine emanator</font>.
$MyPCName$, please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020009$</font> and turn off the <font color="#ffd200">high-frequency aetherine emanator</font>.
(Say that you turned off the <font color="#ffd200">high-frequency aetherine emanator</font> set up in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020009$</font>.)
Trying to attack using the abandoned robots... $MyPCName$, you saved the lives of many squad members today.
I thank you on behalf of the Humanitas soldiers, $MyPCName$.
The Humanitas-Maple Alliance attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> failed again. The huge wall in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>... Beyond that wall is Tairen...

We had to retreat because of the <font color="#ffd200">long-range artillery</font> set up by Tairen. The destructive power, firing rate, and accuracy of the <font color="#ffd200">long-range artillery</font> called KG-42 made the allied forces suffer greatly and retreat.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> immediately and destroy the <font color="#ffd200">long-range artillery</font>.)
If you could do that, then the attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> could succeed. I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> immediately and destroy the <font color="#ffd200">long-range artillery</font>.)
(Say that you destroyed the <font color="#ffd200">long-range artillery</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>.)
You pulled off something big, $MyPCName$. I need to set up an offensive operation on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> right away.
We obtained intel that <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> is in disorder. Refugees doing whatever they want instead of keeping order are increasing.

There are even refugees who won't follow the orders of <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font>. We need to find out whether it's external or <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font> is losing leadership.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find a way to restore order.)
This is an urgent matter. Please depart immediately.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find a way to restore order.)
You're back, $MyPCName$. What was going on in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>?
(You talked about what happened in <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>.)
Those Kharon... kidnapping wasn't enough and now a psychological warfare... <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font> almost faced a huge crisis. It's thanks to you that it was avoided.
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
The squad discovered injured refugees near <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>. They were evacuated here, but they are still unconscious.
According to the medical officer, the refugees were injured by something else and not Kharon's weapon.
I feel depressed thinking there's something else other than Kharon harassing the refugees.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to track what attacked the refugees.)
I leave it to you, $MyPCName$. Please make it for the refugees to not get hurt anymore.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to track what attacked the refugees.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$. The refugees who were evacuated here have regained their conscience.
They were attacked by mechanical lifeforms while hunting.
(Say that you destroyed the mechanical lifeforms that threatened the refugees.)
You did something great for the refugees again. Thank you for always meeting expectations, $MyPCName$.
How's the weather here?
(Say that it feels a little hot.)
If it's this hot here in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font>, it must be hotter for the refugees in the wasteland. Am I wrong?
<font color="#909090">(She is silently pressuring you to go to <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font> and resolve the heat for the refugees.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find a way to resolve the heat.)
You must be busy, but I won't stop you from volunteering. Then please depart.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find a way to resolve the heat.)
You're back, $MyPCName$. Did you resolve the heat for the refugees?
(You talked about what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.)
Making shades out of the wings of the mechanical lifeforms... That's a great idea, but I pity the situation of the refugees where they have to utilize such things.
(Say that you will help out more for the refugees to not be inconvenienced.)
$MyPCName$, cherish that heart of yours. Good work again.
Tairen does fireworks around this time every year. It's to wish happiness for their loved ones.
Many citizens go up the railing to shoot all kinds of fireworks. This event is also held grandly here in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font> every year.
The refugees of <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font> would never imagine doing fireworks... I'm concerned that the refugees might feel dejected.
<font color="#909090">(You have a great idea! There are those in Kharon that throw <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001364$</font>!)</font>
(Say that you will make a brief visit to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.)
<font color="#909090">(You have a great idea! There are those in Kharon that throw <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001364$</font>!)</font>
Isn't this <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001364$</font> used by Kharon?
(Say that you prepared it because the refugees might feel like doing fireworks if they throw <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001364$</font> outside of <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>.)
That's a great idea! I wonder why I haven't thought of that. The refugees will have a fun time doing fireworks for the first time thanks to you.
I will send the <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:30001364$</font> to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> right away.
You know that the Daemon Army is tainting <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> with dark power, right?
But the contaminated area has been increasing at a rapid pace. If nothing is done, I'm worried that even <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> will get tainted by the dark power.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a way to stop the contamination.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. Please save the Leshy's base that is in danger.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a way to stop the contamination.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Did you stop the dark power in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> from spreading?
(Say that the Daemon Army increased their forces to spread the contamination, and you suppressed them and prevented it from spreading.)
Those Daemon Army... they were trying to taint all of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> with the dark power.
It's fortunate that it was stopped. You did something great. Good work, $MyPCName$.
According to the intelligence department, the Leshy in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> are going through a food shortage.
The Leshy enjoyed a relatively rich life due to the abundance of tree fruits in their surroundings... but they suddenly have a food shortage. I'm sure that something happened.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to investigate the cause of the food shortage.)
Could you do that? I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to investigate the cause of the food shortage.)
You're back, $MyPCName$. Why did the Leshy go through a food shortage?
(Say that the food shortage was due to the animals of the Daemon Army eating the fruits in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>.)
Of course...
(Say that you chased away all of the animals from the Daemon Army.)
You always take care of things efficiently. I like that, $MyPCName$.

The Daemon Army isn't stopping their attempt to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy. They are continually sending lifeforms encroached by the dark power to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.
The Leshy can't fend off the Daemon Army with their primitive weapon. We need to tighten the security of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> somehow...
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to discuss a way to tighten security.)
Thank you very much for speaking up first. Then I leave this to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to discuss a way to tighten security.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Did you find a way to tighten the security of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>?
(You told <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
You stuck the sharp teeth of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022507$</font> on the cudgel used by the Leshy? That's a great idea! That will definitely increase the combat power of the Leshy.
It was perfect again! Good work, $MyPCName$.
We obtained intel that the Leshy residents in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> have been noticeably active. According to the drone video, it doesn't look like commercial activity...
The Leshy gathered in a specific location. It's fine if it's something good, but we need to help the Leshy if it's something bad.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find out what happened.)
I leave it to you, $MyPCName$. I hope it isn't something bad...
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find out what happened.)
I have been waiting, $MyPCName$. What happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>?
(You told <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
So they were repairing the temple... It's fortunate nothing bad happened.
You were even kind to help them with the temple repair. Good work.
Rest well until the next briefing.
I'm a bit busy right now, $MyPCName$. Could you come back later?
What is it?
The full-scale attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> started. The regular army and special forces will attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> together.

(Say that you will go and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022600$</font>, the main force, first because there will be many casualties due to the firm defense of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font>.)
I will be grateful if you could do that, but you recently completed a mission. I can't let you shoulder this burden.
(Say that it isn't a burden.)
I'm indebted to you again. Then I'll trust and leave it to you, $MyPCName$.

(Say that you will go and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022600$</font>, the main force, first because there will be many casualties due to the firm defense of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font>.)
(Say that you suppressed the Daemon Army security forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font>.)
That was quick. I can't believe it. I didn't mean I don't believe you. What I meant was...
(Say that you know what she meant.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. Let's begin the full-scale attack.
The offensive operation on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> has hit a snag.
What is it?
The Daemon Army turned <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022604$</font> evil and deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font>.
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022604$</font> is dealing great damage to the allies with its sharp poison stinger.
If the damage becomes greater, we need to stop the attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and reorganize our forces.
<font color="#909090">(Those Daemon Army... they even turned the robot insects evil and used them...)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022604$</font> to prevent damage to the regular army.)
Would you do that? Be careful of the poison stinger on <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022604$</font>.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022604$</font> to prevent damage to the regular army.)
(Say that you suppressed <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022604$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font>.)
The offensive operation on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> will receive some strength again. Good work, $MyPCName$.
A few of the Daemon Army forces deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> have monstrous combat power. They are like the special forces when compared to Humanitas.
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022702$</font> especially has powerful combat power that can't be explained with its physical structure.
The research team expects <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001367$</font> on the head of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022702$</font> is its source of power.
Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and obtain <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001367$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022702$</font>?
It will be very helpful for the research team in finding out its power.
Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and obtain <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001367$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022702$</font>?
(Say that you obtained <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001367$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022702$</font>.)
That's enough for the research team to analyze. I will send them to the research team right away.
Thank you again, $MyPCName$.
The PK 2X aetherine bullet can't pierce it... What is it made of?
(Ask what is going on.)
The rifle bullet of the allies can't pierce the shield of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022704$</font> stationed in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.
The PK 2X aetherine bullet can pierce even the armor of Tairen's mechanical soldiers...
We need to analyze the shield's component and find a way to pierce it in order to attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>, destroy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022704$</font>, and obtain <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001368$</font>.)
Would you do that? Please take action immediately as this is an urgent matter.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>, destroy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022704$</font>, and obtain <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001368$</font>.)
(Say that you destroyed <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022704$</font> and obtained <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001368$</font>.)
This looks like common metal... I wonder how bullets bounce off it.
I'll send it to the research team right away and ask them to investigate. Good work, $MyPCName$.
You may already know, but the outskirts of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020032$</font> have been occupied by the Daemon Army. We had to withdraw our forces due to their ambush.
The problem is that we withdrew in a hurry and didn't retrieve the mid-range cannons. It saddens me to see the cannons just sitting there in the place occupied by the Daemon Army.

Retrieving at least the parts would be very helpful to the fighting power of the allies... We're having a hard time because the cannons set up in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font> are lacking parts.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020032$</font> and retrieve the <font color="#ffd200">mid-range cannon parts</font>.)
Thank you very much for recommending it first, $MyPCName$. I look forward to your wonderful performance again.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020032$</font> and retrieve the <font color="#ffd200">mid-range cannon parts</font>.)
(Say that you went to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020032$</font> and retrieved the <font color="#ffd200">mid-range cannon parts</font>.)
It must have been hard as it was heavy, $MyPCName$. I will send them immediately to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font>.
It will be very helpful in strengthening the military power of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font>.

We found out the location of the <font color="#ffd200">weapon box</font> that Tairen gave Kharon. It's the weapon box they receive in return for providing information after placing a spy in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font>.
After Kharon claimed the weapon box, they transported it to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020016$</font>. We can discover the <font color="#ffd200">weapon box</font> if we ambush them there.
$MyPCName$, please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020016$</font> and seize the <font color="#ffd200">weapon box</font>.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020016$</font> and seize the <font color="#ffd200">weapon box</font>.
(Say that you seized the <font color="#ffd200">weapon box</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020016$</font>.)
Perfect! We will take this chance when Kharon's fighting power is weak to carry out a raid operation immediately.
Good work, $MyPCName$. Could you call in <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004386[gender:0]$</font> as you go out?
(Say that she looks like she has mixed feelings.)
How should I put this... There's something I'm curious about. I received a report that the Poings in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font> are obsessed with a certain fruit tree.
It's a fruit tree with <font color="#ffd200">blue fruits</font>. They attack fiercely when the scout team goes near it. I'm curious what kind of fruit it is for them to be obsessed.
$MyPCName$, I think you'll be curious too... Why don't you check it out personally?
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font> and reveal why the Poings are obsessed with a certain fruit tree.
If you're curious, could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font> and pick some <font color="#ffd200">blue fruits</font>?
(Say that you picked the <font color="#ffd200">blue fruits</font>.)
This is...! This is not a fruit but a baby Poing! So the Poings are born on trees in a fruit form.
That is why the adult Poings were preventing everyone from approaching the tree. They were protecting their babies.
Good work. Then please return the fruit... I mean, baby Poing to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font>.
(Feels like you fell for it.)
Don't tell me you're a cruel person who would separate a baby Poing from the adult? Now, hurry along.

Tairen's <font color="#ffd200">long-range cannons</font> are placed in the outskirts of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font>. The <font color="#ffd200">long-range cannon</font> called KG-42 is a weapon with tremendous destructive power.
Our allies deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> have received great damage from the <font color="#ffd200">long-range cannon</font> placed there.

<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font> will also receive great damage once the <font color="#ffd200">long-range cannon</font> start firing. Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font> before the firing begins and destroy the <font color="#ffd200">long-range cannon</font>.
Please be careful and don't get hurt as it's a difficult mission, $MyPCName$.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font> before the firing begins and destroy the <font color="#ffd200">long-range cannon.
(Say that you destroyed the <font color="#ffd200">long-range cannons</font> before the firing began.)
I already heard of your performance from my communication with <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020033$</font>.
You destroyed all of the <font color="#ffd200">long-range cannons</font> without mercy. It was perfect again, $MyPCName$.

I called you in a hurry since this is an important mission, $MyPCName$. <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004618[gender:0]$</font> tried to make contact with us through his aide, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004619[gender:0]$</font>.

<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004619[gender:0]$</font> offered to arrange a meeting with <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004618[gender:0]$</font> if we go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020051$</font> to see him.
We haven't ascertained if it's true or not. It could be a trap by Kharon.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020051$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004619[gender:0]$</font>.)

Leave immediately if it's a trap. Please meet <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004619[gender:0]$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020051$</font>, figure out the whereabouts of <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004618[gender:0]$</font>, and make contact with him.
This is a dangerous mission. Please be careful.

Please meet <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004619[gender:0]$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020051$</font>, figure out the whereabouts of <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004618[gender:0]$</font>, and make contact with him.
You've returned safely, $MyPCName$. Did you make contact with <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004618[gender:0]$</font>?
(You talked about what happened with <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004618[gender:0]$</font>.)
He wants exile because he got pushed away by the second-in-command, Kalia? If we gain <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004618[gender:0]$</font>, we can get important information to destroy Kharon.
I will form a negotiation team right away and make contact with <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004618[gender:0]$</font>. Good work, $MyPCName$.
We obtained intel that Tairen is testing new mechanical soldiers in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font>.
They are existing mechanical soldiers and the latest machine in blue. We need to figure out their new weapon if we don't want to lose the war with Tairen.

Fortunately, the scout team discovered a <font color="#ffd200">data analyzer</font> for mechanical soldiers set up in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font>. It seems like Tairn is testing the performance of the new weapon with the <font color="#ffd200">data analyzer</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font>.
The mission this time is to obtain the test data of the <font color="#ffd200">data analyzer</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font>. Please depart immediately, $MyPCName$.
The mission this time is to obtain the test data of the <font color="#ffd200">data analyzer</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font>.
(Say that you obtained the test data in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font>.)
Good work, $MyPCName$. I will send it to the research team right away for analysis.
We will find the weakness of Tairen's new weapon without fail.
What do you call the contaminants of the Daemon Army in Maple World?
(Say that they are usually described as dark power.)
Humanitas is trying to take scientific approach in analyzing that jelly like substance.
(Say that being encroached by the dark power is not a scientific phenomenon.)
How could you have such irrational thoughts? There is nothing that isn't revealed by science, $MyPCName$. We will find out on what principle that offensive substance is encroaching the world.
<font color="#909090">(Nothing will get through to her. She will understand what you meant once they start analyzing...)</font>
$MyPCName$, please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font> and collect the <font color="#ffd200">dark power</font>.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font> and collect the <font color="#ffd200">dark power</font>.
(Say that you collected the <font color="#ffd200">dark power</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font>.)
I will send it to the research team right away for analysis. We might find a way to take apart these offensive things with chemicals.
<font color="#909090">(It's all vain... but she'll realize after going through some suffering...)</font>
Good work, $MyPCName$.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020017$</font> is an ancient ruin of Kritias. I expect it was built to be used as a state building a long time ago... nothing is known other than that.
Since we have secured the northwestern part of Kidel, Humanitas plans on exploring <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020017$</font>.
The first journey of the exploration is to secure the <font color="#ffd200">ancient ruin of the state building</font>. We might find out the origin of the state building by investigating the ruin.
$MyPCName$, the mission this time is to secure the <font color="#ffd200">ancient ruin of the state building</font>. Please head towards <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020017$</font> immediately.
The mission this time is to secure the <font color="#ffd200">ancient ruin of the state building</font>. Please head towards <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020017$</font>.
(Say that you secured the <font color="#ffd200">ancient ruin of the state building</font>.)
It's a mysterious blue color that is dazzling. I think it's a different energy from aetherine.
I will ask the research team to analyze it immediately. Good work, $MyPCName$.
We found <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100114$</font>, but our allies are having trouble entering.
(Ask what trouble they are facing.)
It's because of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022901$</font> guarding <font color="#ffd200">Tekin</font>. They are beasts placed by Kharon to defend <font color="#ffd200">Tekin</font>...
The soldiers received great damage due to their sharp tusks. It's not easy to suppress them since they are covered in armor and very fast.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100114$</font> and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022901$</font>.)
